attributes.action: Make teaching of the highway code compulsory in schools as part of PSE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2007 30,720 people were killed or seriously injured on Britains roads 3,090 were children. By bringing in compulsory study of the Highway Code as a part of already existing Personal and Social Education classes (PSE)it is hoped that these figures can be reduced in the future.
